data.title: Stratovarius *LIVE* @ Gods of Metal (Milan, 1998)
data.meta_description:
Stratovarius performing @ 1998 Gods of Metal festival in Milan, Italy during the tour for the "Visions of Europe" live album promotion.

The show was hampered by many technical issues to Timo Tolkki's guitar which led to delays and to the organizers to decide to cut the show short preventing the band to perform the last song in the set, Timo Tolkki complained heavily with the technicians and afterwards was so furious that he smashed his guitar on the floor, you can see it clearly at the end of the video.

The drive and performance is great nevertheless. The classic line-up at their peak times.

Set list :

0:00 - Black diamond
6:15 - Paradise
11:50 - Speed of light
15:50 - Before the winter
25:20 - Forever free
31:45 - The kiss of Judas
38:00 - Hold on to your dream
41:45 - Forever
45:05 - Father time (aborted) + Timo smashes guitar

Band :

Timo Tolkki - Guitars
Timo Kotipelto - Vocals
Jari Kainulainen - Bass guitar
Jens Johansson - Keyboards
Jorg Michael - Drums
